Mega Squad Advantage
by Michael Moffitt 
2014

How to play:
Slap the other player around of bunch to win!
Your health is shown in your corner.

Use the dash strategically to evade your enemy and strike at the right time.
You may slap during a dash, and you may dash during a slap.

Controls:
A - Slap
B - Jump
C - Dash
D-pad - Movements


http://www.sega-16.com/forum/showthread.php?28684-I-made-an-MD-Genesis-Game-Jam-game
http://mikejmoffitt.com/msa.bin
